home.title: Welcome!
home.description: Eurofurence {number} will take place from {start} - {end}, {year}. Eurofurence is Europe's largest annual gathering of the European furry community.

nosecount.title: Nosecount
nosecount.description: Check out how many folks already decided to join this years Eurofurence - nice statistics included!
nosecount.keywords: Statistics, Stats, Nosecount, Registration, Reg, Sign-Up

jobs.title: Jobs at Eurofurence
jobs.description: You want to volunteer at Eurofurence and become staff at Europe's biggest furry convention? Read on for currently open positions.
jobs.keywords: Jobs, Volunteer, Staff, Crew, Help, Gopher

glympse.title: xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
glympse.description: Follow the surge of furries towards Berlin and back live on Glympse.

hotel.title: Venue
hotel.description: This year's venue is the Estrel Hotel in Berlin. It features a large amount of luxurious rooms, restaurants and a lot of convention space to roam.
hotel.keywords: Hotel, Estrel, Berlin, Convention Center, Accommodation, Venue, Rooms, Restaurants

hotel/map.title: Venue - Map
hotel/map.description: The function space map! This is your ultimate 'How to get around!'
hotel/map.keywords: Hotel, Floor Plan, Navigation, Venue, Berlin, How to get around

hotel/overflow.title: Venue - Overflow Options
hotel/overflow.description: Get a room! Even if you didn't catch one at the main hotel, here are some official options for you.

charity.title: Charity
charity.description: This year all donations, collections and more will go to support {charity}.

goh.title: Guests of Honor
goh.description: Again we have some special people amongst us - our Guests of Honor. This year we have {goh}.
goh.keywords: Special guests, GOH, Guests of Honor

events.title: Events
events.description: General information for those interested in organizing a panel or event at Eurofurence. The schedule will be posted here shortly before the convention.

daily.title: The Daily Eurofurence
daily.description: The Daily Eurofurence is a printed daily newsletter that is distributed for free during Eurofurence.
daily.keywords: Daily, Daily Eurofurence, News, Newspaper, Printed news

fursuits.title: Fursuit Support
fursuits.description: All information for fursuiters: Everything about the Fursuit lounge, the parade and everything else.
fursuits.keywords: Fursuit Support, Suiter, Fursuit Lounge, Lounge, Headless Lounge

photography.title: Photography
photography.description: The Eurofurence photography team takes care of the "official photography stuff" that is happening at EF.

conbook.title: Con Book
conbook.description: The con book is the number one guide for every attendee of Eurofurence. Event information, floor plans and more.

artshow.title: Art Show - General Information
artshow.description: The Eurofurence Art Show is a large art exhibition. It is your chance to display your works and/or purchase a fine piece of art for your home.
artshow.keywords: Art Show, Art, Display, Artwork, Prints, Originals, Bidding

artshow/bidding.title: Art Show - Bidding Process & -rules
artshow/bidding.description: A guide & tips on how to bid on art at the Eurofurence Art Show.
artshow/bidding.keywords: Art Show, Bidding, Rules, Limitations, Artwork, Display, Originals

artshow/signup.title: Artshow - Sign-Up
artshow/signup.description: Find out how and when to sign-up in order to exhibit your art in the Eurofurence Art Show.

artshow/rules.title: Art Show - Rules
artshow/rules.description: Rules and guidelines for art exhibited in the Eurofurence Art Show.
artshow/rules.keywords: Art Show, Rules, Limitations, Artwork, Display, Originals

artshow/guide.title: Art Show - Guide
artshow/guide.description: A comprehensive guide on how to exhibit art in the Eurofurence Art Show.
artshow/guide.keywords: Art Show, Guide, Limitations, Artwork, Display, Originals

dealersden.title: Dealers' Den
dealersden.description: The Dealers' Den is the place for all you merchants and artists for selling your fine products.
dealersden.keywords: Dealers' Den, Selling, Merchants, Artist, Dealers, Merchandise, Artwork, Sketches, Shirts, Shopping, Souvenirs

dealersden/alley.title: Artist Alley
dealersden/alley.description: The Artist Alley is an open, first-come-first-serve alternative to the Dealers' Den.
dealersden/alley.keywords: Artist, Alley, Dealers' Den, Selling, Merchants, Dealers, Merchandise, Artwork, Sketches, Shirts, Shopping, Souvenirs

policies.title: Policies
policies.description: The necessary rules and guidelines you need to know before attending Eurofurence.

website.title: Website Credits & Support
website.description: The website credits - see who helped and contributed this year.
website.keywords: Website, Credits, Featured Artist, Support, Webmaster, Design, Bug Report

website/banner.title: Website Banner Exchange Program
website/banner.description: Eurofurence is participating in a banner exchange program to connect furry conventions.
